sentences.sContent: Craig Dietz, a US man born armless and legless, took part in a swimming competition in Pennsylvania recently with the help of a manmade caudal fin and finished 275th out of 308 participants.
sentences.sContent_eng: Craig Dietz, a US man born armless and legless, took part in a swimming competition in Pennsylvania recently with the help of a manmade caudal fin and finished 275th out of 308 participants.
sentences.sCn: 在美国宾夕法尼亚州最近举办的游泳比赛中，没有双臂和双腿的"无肢人"克雷格·迪茨使用"人造尾鳍"参加了比赛，并在308名参赛者中名列275位。
